product_name: GoFit Contour Kettlebell with DVD - 20 lbs.
long_description: The 20 lb. GoFit Contour kettlebell with DVD has an ergonomic design that fits your wrist and forearm for greater comfort during your workout. Kettlebell is made of solid cast iron that is dipped in vinyl for a thick, durable rubberized coating; powder-coated handle provides a sure grip that is easy on the hands. 20 lb. kettlebell is the perfect intermediate weight for intense kettlebell workouts. Includes a 30 min. training DVD with Brook Benten.
short_description: The 20 lb. GoFit Contour kettlebell with DVD has an ergonomic design that fits your wrist and forearm for greater comfort during your workout.
